name: Typelib Generated C/C++ Header File
summary: Learn about .TLH files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: The #import directive generates both TLH and TLI files. For example, the command #import "mylib.tlb" generates the "mylib.tlh" and "mylib.tli" files from a .TLB file.

description: Header file generated by a Microsoft C/C++ compiler; contains definitions of interfaces and identifiers generated by the #import directive; used in conjunction with a .TLI file to reconstruct compiled type library contents for use in C/C++ source code.
